d:testDescription.p: The test checks the SVGTransformList.consolidate method.

d:operatorScript.p: Run the test. No interaction required.

d:passCriteria.p: There must be 13 green rectangles visible. The text next to the first rectangle must say "Scripting enabled". The other 12 lines must each say "Passed subtest #n" where n is the subtest number 1..12. If anything red shows, the test has failed.
